evidence.source_document: Findings Of Fact And Conclusions Of Law
evidence.text: Consequently, the Court hereby enjoins the conducting of an election under Congressional District No. 1 until a constitutionally valid apportionment plan is approved by this Court.

extracted.value: until a constitutionally valid apportionment plan is approved: enjoining the conducting of an election under Congressional District No. 1

evidence.text: Consequently, the Court hereby enjoins the conducting of an election under Congressional District No. 1 after the 2024 election cycle until a constitutionally valid apportionment plan is approved by this Court.

extracted.value: after the 2024 election cycle until a constitutionally valid apportionment plan is approved: enjoining the conducting of an election under Congressional District No. 1 after the 2024 election cycle
